infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: RideHub needs access to your photos to allow you to upload profile pictures and share ride images.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: RideHub needs access to your location to find rides near you and track journeys.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: RideHub needs background access to your location to provide real-time navigation and ride tracking features.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: RideHub needs background access to your location to provide real-time navigation and ride tracking features.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: RideHub needs access to your contacts to help you find friends who use the app and share rides.
infoPlist.NSFileProviderDomainUsageDescription: RideHub needs access to file storage to save ride information and user data.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: RideHub needs access to motion and sensor data to detect ride status and improve ride quality detection.
